item.title: The 29 Best Movies on Apple TV+ Right Now (September 2025)
item.description: Highest 2 Lowest, Deaf President Now!, and Number One on the Call Sheet are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: 25 Best MagSafe Accessories (2025): Qi2 Chargers, Magnetic Wallets, and More
item.description: The weird, wonderful world of MagSafe accessories (Qi2 included) can make your phone feel modular. These are our favorites.

item.title: Chromebooks vs. PC: The Differences Between Chrome OS and Windows
item.description: If you're trying to decide between a Chromebook and a Windows laptop, some recent changes have shaken up how these two platforms compare.

item.title: AllTrails Hiking App Review: Outdoor Planning and Navigation
item.description: Forget the wads of paper maps—AllTrails keeps everything you need to plan your outdoor trip on your phone.

item.title: 12 Best Cheap Laptops (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From surprisingly good $300 Chromebooks to excellent $650 Windows laptops, these are the best budget laptops we’ve tested.
